Home Description: Select a dictation to begin. A text field and audio clips will appear. Listen carefully to each audio clip and transcribe what you hear as accurately as possible. Once you've finished, you'll be able to review your results.

Language Change.description: Are you sure you want to change the language ?

About.title: About us
About.text: Parroglot was created to redefine how people learn languages. I discovered that dictations are one of the most effective tools for improving listening, spelling, and grammar.
About.text_2: This platform aims not only to provide dictations in various languages, but also to include powerful features designed to support and enhance every step of the learning process. With Parroglot, language learning becomes more interactive, intuitive, and rewarding.

Support.title: Support us
Support.text: Parroglot is built with passion to make language learning smarter, more interactive, and accessible to everyone.
Support.text_2: Support Parroglot and help us make language learning better for everyone. Every donation, big or small, makes a difference ❤️
